features: IT'S LIGHTER ON THE INSIDE; a light interior is easy to label with an ordinary pen, easier to read and prevents accidental misfiles between folders
BOOST SPEED and EFFICIENCY: color folders in bright red, green, yellow and blue let you spot the right file through color association and speed filing and retrieval times
LETTER-SIZE FOLDERS fit standard 8-1/2" x 11" documents; 36 assorted color folders per pack in red, green, yellow and blue; use with matching Pendaflex hanging file folders
1/3-CUT TABS allow plenty of room for labeling; assorted positions allow you to cascade headers from left to right for uninterrupted viewing
ON THE OTHER HAND: Here's a smart tip; use two-tone folders reversed, vibrant side in, for double the color options; 4 colors become 8
body.description: Pendaflex Two-Tone Color File Folders come in bright shades with lighter interiors to prevent time-wasting misfiles. Choose your favorite color for the entire system or color code your file folders by project, vendor or department and watch your productivity soar. Why is color coding faster? You read color more quickly and efficiently than text alone so you'll retrieve files with greater speed and accuracy. This color assortment will help you manage up to 4 categories at a glance.Letter sized; 1/3-cut tabs in assorted positions; assorted colors. 36 Pack.Brighten the office: introduce a pop of color by converting your files to bold cheery folders in bright red, green, yellow and blueKeep it easy to read: two-tone file folders are lighter on the inside for a reason; you'll have no trouble labeling lighter tabs in pencil or pen, dark permanent markers not required; you'll also avoid time-wasting misfiles between file foldersInexpensive and Expandable: Each file folder is scored at bottom to expand with your workloadChoose color for faster filing: take advantage of your brain's color-coding efficiency to identify files faster and spot file folders in the wrong placeMake the whole office more efficient: color-coded filing is easy to introduce to the whole group so your shared files are easier to navigateMade at home: these Pendaflex file folders are proudly made in the USA, a mark of quality you can rely on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us TOPS Products helps you build a better office. As one of the leading US manufacturer of filing, note taking and organizational supplies, we bring productivity to offices, schools and homes all over North America. Our brands include the oldest and most trusted names in organization—Oxford, Pendaflex, Cardinal, Ampad, Adams, Boorum & Pease and TOPS. TOPS Products proudly continues our legacy of American innovation at seven major US manufacturing, distribution, corporate and customer service facilities. Our hands-at-work include many of our nation’s veterans, to whom we’ve pledged our loyalty and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and colorful!
reviews.reviewText: I like the bright colors and the fact that the inside of each folder is a lighter shade of the outside color. Much easier to identify the inner portion of each folder when filing! Great value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second set of colored file folders I have purchased. They have multiple uses and being different colors allows me to easily sort my paperwork. I use them 2 to 3 times a week and they are thick enough to stand up to frequent use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy files
reviews.reviewText: And I love the bright colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: These file folders are very sturdy, and the color assortment allows me to easily identify which type of document I need within a sea of files. I will buy again when I need more folders. I know that there are cheapter folders out there, but they act like cheaper folders. I need mine to stand up to repeated opening/closing and transport to locations outside my office. Pendaflex for the win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice And sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these because I need different colored folders so I can remember what I am using them for, green is good, yellow is a need to take care of. And so on and so on and get the picture, I like them I would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organizer with easy access retrieval.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This will be used for filing simple important paper for easy retrieval. I like the different colour section which separate the varies items which I will be labeling , especially for tax returns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: You have no idea the sheer enjoyment I experienced when I found these and when they arrived. These types of folders are super common in North America but looking for them in the UK has been a nightmare. Really thankful for these.
Great for sorting all kinds of important papers!
Bonitos y sirven para mantener en orden la archivístico.
